name: International Conference on Computer Networks, Big Data and IoT
content: ICCBI 2018 will provide an outstanding international forum for scientists from all over the world to share ideas and achievements in the theory and practice of all areas of computer networks, data engineering and communication technologies. Presentations should highlight networking methodologies as a concept that combines theoretical research and applications in communication system, big data, IoT, information and computing technologies. All aspects of computer networks and commuication systems are of interest: theory, algorithms, tools, applications, etc.
